tweets.text: Just walked up to Judge Kavanaugh as morning session ended.  Put out my hand to introduce myself as Jaime Guttenberg's dad.  He pulled his hand back, turned his back to me and walked away.  I guess he did not want to deal with the reality of gun violence.

FOR SHAME, Judge Kavanaugh!

Remember all those stories about Kavanaugh being a regular dad? Well, here he is, snubbing a dad who lost his little girl, to gun violence.

Heartless, petty, and mean.

#SCOTUS #SCOTUSKavanaugh https://t.co/O3IZc4kbhM

@nowthisnews call your Senators right now and tell them to stop Kavanaugh 
-Roe v Wade is on the line 
-Gun violence prevention is on the line 
-Our future is on the line 
Call your Senators and tell them to not appoint Kavanaugh 

(202) 224-3121

Judges are supposed to listen and respond with moral justice.

Walking away from the victims of gun violence is an injustice that our country has practiced for too long.

Kavanaugh is a disgrace to this nation. https://t.co/akXC6ZIR0I
